column1: Little Goat Diner////Side note: I really like that restaurants text me instead of giving me one of those weird buzzers that only work so far away.  If you're gonna make me wait
column2: let me choose where I go.  Right?  So
column3: +1 for that and +1 for letting me reply that we're on our way back (so I know they don't give our seats away).  Woo
